messages.title: Focus on Beverley & Holderness
messages.content: A stronger economy and a fairer society for Beverley & Holderness. 'The Liberal Democrats are creating opportunity for everyone, building a stronger economy for a fairer society.'

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Creating 1.8 million jobs and delivering a record number of apprenticeships. Improving economy and investing in education and apprenticeships.

Making Britain fairer by cutting Income Tax for 24 million ordinary workers, providing an extra Â£2.5 billion per year for struggling school kids, ensuring the single person and the state pension is increasing.

mentions.candidate: We have built a stronger economy, helping businesses create 1.8 million jobs and delivering a record number of apprenticeships. Local man: 'Denis has lived in our constituency for 25 years'

issues.economy: The Liberal Democrats will borrow less than Labour and cut less than the Conservatives, creating opportunity for everyone through a stronger economy and a fairer society.
issues.education: Investing in education and delivering a record number of apprenticeships.

leaflet.personalStatement: Local man: 'Denis has lived in our constituency for 25 years'

quotes.text: 'The Liberal Democrats are creating opportunity for everyone, building a stronger economy for a fairer society.'

images.caption: Denis discussing issues with a Holderness resident.
Local man: Denis has lived in our constituency for 25 years.
